TopicTitle: Making lights use EC ? [EVA and cockpit]

Articles.Content:
Hello.

Long time ago I had a mod that made my EVA suit have EC and drain it when I use the lights.

I believe it was TACLS.

My current career have some kind of realism theme, no F5/9, but decided against life support and virtually no part mods.

I use Monoprop for EVA Fuel, but was wondering if there is separate mod that will allow only the functionality for the EVA EC that (iirc) TACLS provided ?
